item.title: Can I Run HIDs In My Halogen Headlights?
item.description: Older vehicles, especially those from the 90s and older are plagued with dim halogen headlights. Dim headlights can make it a real challenge to drive at night, even more so for those who live out in the country. HID (high intensity discharge) headlights are an alternative to halogens and have become common in newer cars. If you’ve spent anytime behind the wheel you’ve likely seen them in action, and perhaps even envious of the extra light.
